lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Ancr nrpq kI pCwnYN BwKw; bolq bcn iKn bUJ ibn dyK hI [

Unknown.translation: Just as an attendant on king waits behind him and recognises his sound and utterances without even seeing the king.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ rwjy dy nOkr Awpxy rwjy dI bolI isAwxdy hn, ibnwˆ dyKy hI hnyry ivc jwˆ dUr qoˆ rwjy dy bcn boilAwˆ Jt pCwx lYˆdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy jOhrI prK jwnq hY rqn kI; dyKq hI khY KrO Koto rUp ryK hI [

Unknown.translation: Just as a gemologist knows the art of evaluating the precious stones and is able to declare whether a stone is fake or genuine by a look on its form.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ jOhrI jo rqnwˆ dI prK jwxdw hY vyKidAwˆ hI d`s idMdw hY ik ieh Kotw hY jwˆ Krw hY ies ivc koeI ryKw lIk qwˆ nhIˆ hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy KIr nIr ko inbyro kir jwnY hMs; rwKIAY imlwie iBMn iBMn kY sryK hI [

Unknown.translation: Just as a swan knows how to separate milk and water and is able to do in no time.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ hMs du`D qy pwxI dw inrxw krnw jwxdw hY, jy dovyˆ imlw ky aus A`gy r`K dyeIey qwˆ isAwx ky A`f A`f kr idMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gur sbd sunq pihcwnY isK; Awn bwnI ikRqmI n gnq hY lyK hI [570[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, a true Sikh of the True Guru recognises which composition is fake and which one is genuine, created by the True Guru as soon as he hears it. He discards what is not genuine in no time and keeps it in no account.  (570)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ isK gurUSbd nUM suxdy swr hI pCwx lYˆdw hY ik ieh gurbwxI hY qy hor iksy dI rcI bwxI nUM lK lYˆdw hY ik ieh bnwvtI hY qy aus nUM iksy igxqI ivc nhIˆ ilAwauˆdw ]570]
